title: Woodford Patient Capital appoints Schroders to manage renamed fund
text:
Woodford Patient Capital Trust has appointed Schroders to replace discredited stockpicker Neil Woodford as manager of its fund and come up with a new name as it seeks to move past a turbulent few months.

The fund will be rebranded as Schroder UK Public Private Trust shortly after the appointment, which is expected before the end of 2019, the company said.

Mr Woodford was sacked as manager of his flagship equity income fund earlier this month.

On the same day, he resigned as manager of London-listed Patient Capital and announced the "highly painful" decision to shut down his fund management firm Woodford Investment Management.

Susan Searle, Patient Capital's chairman, said Schroders was a "natural...
description: Woodford Patient Capital Trust has appointed Schroders to replace discredited stockpicker Neil Woodford as manager of its fund and come up with a new name as it seeks to move past a turbulent few months.
